author: elenavernazza
body:
#### PR description:

This PR makes the python script `Validation/RecoMET/scripts/makeHLTMETValidationPlots.py` for MET validation plots callable.

#### PR validation:

This PR has been tested by running the plotter on a DQM file.

makeHLTMETValidationPlots.py --file DQM_V0001_R000000001__Global__CMSSW_X_Y_Z__RECO.root --met hltPFPuppiMETTypeOne --odir hltPFPuppiMETTypeOne
title: Make python script `makeHLTMETValidationPlots.py` callable
